svg.title: epicyclic gearing animation
svg.desc: CSS animation of epicyclic gearing with 56-tooth ring gear locked (1), 24-tooth sun gear locked (2), carrier with 16-tooth planetary gears locked (3), and direct drive (4) by CMG Lee. Numbers denote relative angular speed. Shapes are from http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Epicyclic_Gearing_Stationary.svg.
